verbs.description: [ARG1: Ivana Trump and former beau , Rossano Rubicondi] , [V: were] [ARG2: all smiles] [ARGM-TMP: as they strolled from the Amaranth restaurant in the Upper East Side on Friday] .
Ivana Trump and former beau , Rossano Rubicondi , were all smiles as [ARG0: they] [V: strolled] [ARGM-DIR: from the Amaranth restaurant in the Upper East Side] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] .
